item.title: Medium to Hugo
item.description: Taking a minor break from the “ElasticSearch on K8s” series tl;dr: I’m moving back to maintaining my own site rather than depending on Medium as a platform for technical blogging, because of various reasons. Also introducing a tool to convert from Medium to Hugo. A tale of not making up my mind To start with somewhat of a boast, I’ve been writing blog posts for more than a decade now, on various platforms, SaaS ones to self-hosted solutions.
